page.title: 09PRECISION ENGINEERING
page.content: Boundary Precision Engineering is situated on the Lufton Trading Estate. The firm's two owners began business in 1982 and now employ 4 men.They need more workers but finding skilled men is difficult.They borrowed money to begin the business and have added four more machines in the last year.The firm makes dies for investment castingss or plastics and does machining on a sub-contract basis. The small firm is typical of the small businesses which have grown up on the trading estate.Most employ small numbers and are dependant on large firms such as Westland for survival.There has been anxiety recently that the problems of the big companies will rub off onto the small works,causing unemployment and debt.
